"Clay" Drayton (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'ubochí anọ aha = 'USPRI'> "U.S
Public Records Index Mpịakọta nke 1 [database on-line]"
</ref> bụ onye America na-ede abụ, onye nhazi, onye mmepụta na sideman kacha mara amara maka ọrụ ya na Motown
Ọ bụ onye nhazi na ndekọ ọla edo nke Diana Ross, “Love Hangover.”

N'ime ọrụ nke karịrị afọ iri anọ, Al Wilson, Lenny Williams, High Inergy, Táta Vega, na The Jackson 5., Ọ na-ekwu maka ihe gbasara òtù na-ede egwu na otu mpaghara ụwa edekọwo egwu Drayton. Drayton na-akụzi ide egwu na ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ede egwu nke Los Angeles na CA
N'afọ 2006, o mepụtara Phatfoot Drum Harness maka ndị na-akụ egwu na ndị na-akụ egwu
